trends.name: 365 Buttons
trends.description: Users adopt the philosophy of doing one thing daily just for themselves without explaining to others, symbolized by collecting or counting 365 buttons for the year. It originated from a comment in a 2026 rebrand video emphasizing personal freedom. Some literally buy buttons to mark days, turning it into a self-care ritual.
trends.marketability: High - Versatile for self-care products, planners, and wellness brands targeting Gen Z autonomy

trends.name: 2026 is the New 2016
trends.description: Nostalgic throwbacks to 2016 using lo-fi filters, carved eyebrows, Pokémon Go pics, and grainy iPhone shots captioned '2026 is the new 2016.' Users share decade-old archives in carousels and videos lamenting time passed. Celebrities like Selena Gomez and Charlie Puth amplify it with personal 2016 content.
trends.marketability: High - Ideal for retro fashion, filters, and nostalgia merch drops

trends.name: January 2026 TikTok Mashup Dances
trends.description: Epic mashups compiling viral TikTok dances, transitions, and hits from early 2026, featuring high-energy edits and trending audios. Videos blend skits, dances, and remixes for non-stop scrolling vibes. Popular for challenges and FYP dominance.
trends.viral_metric: Multiple videos with 1.2M+ views in compilations
trends.marketability: High - Perfect for dancewear, music collabs, and viral sound licensing

trends.name: Lock-In Mindset
trends.description: Gen Z publicly commits to study habits, fitness goals, and routines, sharing journeys with tight-knit online tribes for accountability and motivation. Emphasizes discipline over casual scrolling. Resonates with New Year's resolution culture.
trends.marketability: High - Monetizable via planners, apps, and accountability coaching

trends.name: Luxury Hygiene Rituals
trends.description: Creators elevate simple routines like skincare and grooming into intentional self-elevation moments, treating everyday self-care as luxury maintenance. Shifts from basic to aesthetic, shareable rituals. Ties into wellness trends.
trends.marketability: High - Strong for beauty products and premium routine kits

trends.name: What to Wear Crowdsource
trends.description: Users ask TikTok comments for outfit advice on what to wear for events, dress codes, or spotlight moments, turning closets into community decisions. Democratizes fashion choices. Expands to aesthetics and styles.
trends.marketability: High - Great for fashion brands and styling apps

trends.name: Cooking Hacks Showoffs
trends.description: Quick recipe hacks evolve into hosting game days, reunions, and social events, flexing TikTok-learned skills in real-life contexts. Blends utility with entertainment. Encourages creative adaptations.
trends.marketability: Medium - Targets kitchen gadgets and meal kit services

trends.name: My Makeup Type Search
trends.description: Audiences query TikTok search for personalized makeup types, aesthetics, and book recs based on engagement history, sparking algorithmic personalization trends. Turns search into discovery tool. Viral for beauty quizzes.
trends.marketability: High - Ideal for cosmetics and AI beauty tools

trends.name: Job Life Realities
trends.description: Content highlights office returns, non-traditional careers, and modern work struggles under #joblife, redefining professional vibes. Evolves from #worklife discussions. Focuses on authenticity over gloss.
trends.marketability: Medium - Appeals to career apps and remote work gear

trends.name: NPC Mode Exit
trends.description: Shifts from feeling like a mindless 'non-player character' to reclaiming #maincharacterenergy with intention and presence. Rejects autopilot living. Motivational for personal growth content.
trends.marketability: Medium - Suits motivational merch and mindset coaching

trends.name: Endless Scroll Hop-Out
trends.description: Users ditch passive FYP scrolling for active comment exploration and searches, seeking deeper engagement. Pushes for mindful consumption. Aligns with anti-doomscrolling vibes.
trends.marketability: Low - Abstract; limited direct product ties

trends.name: 2026 Viral Dance Beat Drop
trends.description: High-energy dance trends with beats like 'It pop it' and mashup audios driving challenges and compilations. Features moves synced to new 2026 hits. Spreads via mashup videos.
trends.marketability: High - Dance challenges boost apparel and music

trends.name: Button Philosophy Edits
trends.description: Remixes and edits of Tamara's 'it only has to make sense to me' catchphrase from 365 Buttons, used as daily motivation. Spreads via duets and stitches. Core to self-empowerment narrative.
trends.marketability: High - Quote merch and journals sell well

trends.name: 2016 Throwback Carousels
trends.description: Instagram-style recap carousels of 2016 pics with hazy filters, focusing on puppy filters and old tech nostalgia. Overwhelms feeds in early 2026. Encourages archive digging.
trends.marketability: High - Vintage photo apps and filter packs

trends.name: Eagles 365 Buttons
trends.description: NFL team Philadelphia Eagles joins 365 Buttons with branded video, tying sports fandom to personal philosophy. Inspires fan adaptations. Crosses pop culture with trends.
trends.marketability: Medium - Sports merch crossovers

trends.name: Devil Wears Prada Rebrand
trends.description: 2026 rebrand videos inspired by Devil Wears Prada aesthetics, sparking 365 Buttons origin. Pinterest-style edits with bold visuals. Fuels fashion motivation.
trends.marketability: High - Fashion and aesthetic inspo products

trends.name: Selena 2016 Tour Throwback
trends.description: Celeb-driven 2016 nostalgia with Selena Gomez posting old tour pics, inspiring fan recreations. Boosts throwback trend authenticity. Lip-syncs and carousels follow.
trends.marketability: High - Tour merch revivals

trends.name: Charlie Puth Lip-Sync Revival
trends.description: Charlie Puth lip-syncs his 2016 hit 'We Don’t Talk Anymore' in throwback video, riding nostalgia wave. Sparks user covers and duets. Ties music to visual trends.
trends.marketability: Medium - Music streaming and covers

trends.name: Tumblr 365 Buttons Crossover
trends.description: Tumblr officially joins 365 Buttons trend, posting about self-doing philosophy. Bridges TikTok to longform platforms. Expands to moodboards and essays.
trends.marketability: Medium - Digital journals and aesthetics

trends.name: 2026 Dance Mashup Not Clean
trends.description: Explicit 'not clean' TikTok dance mashups compiling edgy viral trends and beats for mature audiences. Focuses on raw energy and transitions. Gains traction in niche dance communities.
trends.marketability: Medium - Edgy apparel and nightlife brands
